org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.failover

类 RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.failover.FailoverStrategy
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.failover.RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy

  • public class RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy
extends FailoverStrategy
    A failover strategy that restarts regions of the ExecutionGraph. A region is defined by this strategy as the weakly connected component of tasks that communicate via pipelined data exchange.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy.Factory
      Factory that instantiates the RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy.

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      The execution graph on which this FailoverStrategy works
      private java.util.concurrent.Executor executor
      The executor used for future actions
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG
      The log object used for debugging.
      private java.util.HashMap<ExecutionVertex,FailoverRegion> vertexToRegion
      Fast lookup from vertex to failover region

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy(ExecutionGraph executionGraph)
      Creates a new failover strategy to restart pipelined regions that works on the given execution graph and uses the execution graph's future executor to call restart actions.
      RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy(ExecutionGraph executionGraph, java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
      Creates a new failover strategy to restart pipelined regions that works on the given execution graph and uses the given executor to call restart actions.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy

        public RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy(ExecutionGraph executionGraph)
        Creates a new failover strategy to restart pipelined regions that works on the given execution graph and uses the execution graph's future executor to call restart actions.
        参数:
        executionGraph - The execution graph on which this FailoverStrategy will work

      • RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy

        public RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy(ExecutionGraph executionGraph,
                                      java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Creates a new failover strategy to restart pipelined regions that works on the given execution graph and uses the given executor to call restart actions.
        参数:
        executionGraph - The execution graph on which this FailoverStrategy will work
        executor - The executor used for future actions

        指定者:

        参数:
